response.overview: Centered around the Flying Gauchito, the short tells a story about the Gauchito visiting a local cantina and finding that he has a laugh shrill enough to break glass. However, with his laugh causing trouble there, he runs away from home to join a traveling carnival and hopefully make a good life out of his talent. However, it all falls apart on opening night when his laugh is unable to break a mirror. Though disappointed, he is relieved that things are back to normal.
response.title: The Laughing Gauchito
